job.title: Senior Software Engineer (Python)
job.description: We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer (Python) that will be responsible for assisting the software development team with developing and designing web applications, performing cross-browser and cross-platform testing, writing good quality, scalable, and testable code, analyze and maintain existing software application, and discover and fix programming bugs.This position works closely with the software development and leadership team to contribute to a robust, innovative software solution. You will work on innovative and exciting projects that make a lasting impact on Mobile reCell and our clients.ResponsibilitiesWrite effective, scable code using Python programming languageCoordinate with development team to determine application requirementsAssist with back-end development by coding, debugging and testing software applicationsDevelop modules in Python for automation and solving business problemsCoordinate with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements into applicationsAssist software development team to implement code fixes under the direction of senior developersAssist development team in infrastructure maintenance and security enhancementsApply best practices for scalabilityCreate and test effective API endpointsDevelop automated test scripts utilizing our existing testing frameworkWrite complex SQL scripts, stored proceduresAssist in the selection and implementation of tools and technologies used in development, project planning/tracking, and testingUnderstand business problems and architect solutionsManage multiple projects in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environmentPerform other software development tasks as neededExperience with Git Flow methodologyExperience with microservices oriented architectureQualificationsBS or MS in Computer Science, Engineering preferred but not required6+ Years of relevant work experienceMinimum of 2 Years experience with building APIs and services using REST or similarMinimum of 2 Years experience with modern programming languages like Python or JavaExperience in following coding and documentation standards and adhering to best practicesExperience in deploying python applications in Linux environmentsExperience with containerized applicationsExperience with data serializationKnowledge of Algorithms/data structures, Object Oriented Design Principles, Networking (TCP, UDP data transfer methods)Knowledgeable and experience in security protocolsStrong problem solving, analytical, and critical thinking skillsDemonstrated ability to perform effectively and positively in a fast-paced, team-oriented environmentKnowledge and ability to implement smart modern web standards including accessibility and usabilityAbility to work independently with minimal supervisionExperience with DataTables/SQL Reporting/SSRS/Power BI is a great plusExperience in data analytics and machine learning is a great plusJob Type: Full-timePay: $110,000.00 - $125,000.00 per yearBenefitsDental insuranceDisability insuranceEmployee discountFlexible scheduleHealth insuranceLife insurancePaid time offProfessional development assistanceVision insuranceScheduleMonday to FridayApplication Question(s)Will you now, or in the future, require sponsorship for employment
